feed.title: NewsTracker: robert durst

entry.title: Robert Durst to Be Moved to Jail Closer to New Orleans
entry.summary: U.S. District Judge Helen Berrigan signed an order Monday to move Robert Durst from a prison 70 miles away from the city to a jail in St. Charles Parish, about 25 miles away.

entry.title: Lawyer: Louisiana gun case against millionaire Durst dropped
entry.summary: NEW ORLEANS (AP) - An attorney for real estate heir Robert Durst says state weapon charges against him have been dropped, clearing the way for federal proceedings in New Orleans on similar charges.

entry.title: Lawyer: Louisiana gun case against millionaire Durst dropped
Durst Wants His Money Back; Police Have $161K
entry.summary: Lawyers for jailed millionaire Robert Durst say he wants authorities to return more than $161,000 in cash now held by New Orleans police.

entry.title: Durst pleads not guilty to federal gun charge in New Orleans
entry.summary: NEW ORLEANS (Reuters) - Real estate scion Robert Durst, who has been charged with murder in California, pleaded not guilty on Tuesday to a federal gun charge stemming from his arrest last month in New Orleans.

entry.title: Durst 1st federal court appearance scheduled Tue afternoon
entry.summary: NEW ORLEANS (AP) - Jailed millionaire Robert Durst has his first court appearance in connection with the newest charge against him - a federal charge of possessing a gun after a felony conviction.

entry.title: Robert Durst charged in handgun case

Robert Durst pleads not guilty to firearm charges
Real estate scion Robert Durst indicted on weapons charges in New Orleans
entry.summary: Durst, recently featured in the HBO documentary "The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst," has been charged with the 2000 murder of a longtime friend in Los Angeles County and has sought a swift extradition to face that charge.

entry.title: Robert Durst indicted on weapons charges in New Orleans
entry.summary: NEW ORLEANS - A prosecutor's spokesman says millionaire real estate heir Robert Durst has been indicted on two weapons charges from his March arrest in Louisiana.

entry.title: Robert Durst's re-emergence puts spotlight on Fox News' Jeanine Pirro, a former prosecutor
entry.summary:
Last weekend, she was portrayed in a "Saturday Night Live" skit as telling Durst, "I'm always right behind you, Robert, and I'm gonna catch you with my own two gorgeously manicured hands."

"The first person I thought of was Robert Durst," Pirro said.

entry.title: Vermont police: Missing student last seen at Robert Durst store
entry.summary: A photo appearing in the HBO documentary "The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst" shows Robert Durst during an interview with director Andrew Jarecki.

entry.title: Robert Durst 'was tricked', his lawyer says
entry.summary: Dick DeGuerin, Robert Durst's lawyer, says his client "was tricked" by the filmmakers behind the popular HBO series "The Jinx."

entry.title: Robert Durst linked to 1971 missing college student: police
Robert Durst denied bail in New Orleans, linked to Vermont cold case
Robert Durst denied bail in New Orleans, linked to Vermont cold case
entry.summary: Also on Monday, police in Middlebury, Vermont, said they were probing a link between Lynne Schulze, a college student who vanished 44 years ago, and Durst, who owned a health food store in town.

entry.title: New Orleans judge declares Robert Durst major flight risk, denies bail
entry.summary: Murder suspect Robert Durst is seen with a newly shaved head as he sits in a hearing in this court sketch in New Orleans, Louisiana March 23, 2015.

entry.title: Robert Durst ordered held without bail in New Orleans
New Orleans judge declares Robert Durst major flight risk, denies bail
entry.summary: Durst, the real estate scion awaiting extradition to California to face a murder charge, was denied bail on Monday after a judge deemed him to be a potential danger to others and a likely flight risk.

entry.title: Robert Durst denied bail, called flight risk by judge
Millionaire Robert Durst returning to court in New Orleans
entry.summary: Durst is going back to court in New Orleans after nearly a week in a prison mental ward 70 miles away.

entry.title: Lawyers: Millionaire Robert Durst was illegally arrested on murder charge in New Orleans
entry.summary: Millionaire Robert Durst was illegally arrested on charges that he murdered a woman in California, as well as drug and weapons charges filed in New Orleans, attorneys said in court papers Friday.

entry.title: Robert Durst deemed 'suicidal'
Affidavit: LAPD analyst's error delayed Robert Durst link
entry.summary: Durst himself may have pointed to the home, in a recording made while talking to himself after a tense interview with the makers of the six-part HBO documentary "The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst," which wrapped up Sunday.

entry.title: Robert Durst is ?suicidal,' moved to jail for mentally ill
entry.summary: A trail of clues led to Durst's arrest.

A car passes the building where millionaire Robert Durst lives hours before police began a search Tuesday, March 17, 2015, in Houston.

Law enforcement officers walk toward the building where Robert Durst owns some condominiums Tuesday, March 17, 2015, in Houston.

entry.title: Police searching Houston home of millionaire Robert Durst
entry.summary: HOUSTON (AP) - Police on Tuesday were searching the Houston home of millionaire Robert Durst after his arrest over the weekend in New Orleans.

entry.title: The Jinx, Serial: Robert Durst murder case highlights journalists' changing role as crime sleuths
entry.summary: Robert Durst after his arraignment in New Orleans, March 17, 2015.

entry.title: Prosecutor: Durst had nearly 150 grams of pot when arrested
entry.summary: In the documentary "The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst" that just wrapped up, Durst mumbled about how he "killed them all," providing a dramatic kick to the end of the series.

entry.title: Prosecutor: Robert Durst had a revolver, stash of pot when arrested
entry.summary: Authorities found more than a quarter-pound of marijuana and a revolver in millionaire Robert Durst?s hotel room when he was arrested over the weekend, a prosecutor said Tuesday.

entry.title: Robert Durst Audio Was ???Chilling??? to Discover, Director Says
entry.summary: PHOTO: Robert Durst was arrested in New Orleans, Saturday night, March 14, 2015.

entry.title: Robert Durst charged with murder, movie confession likely admissible
entry.summary:
NEW ORLEANS - New York real estate scion and accused murderer Robert Durst's bathroom muttering that he "killed them all" would likely be admissible evidence in a murder trial, legal experts said on Monday.

Durst, the subject of a six-part HBO documentary series called "The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst," was picked up by a filmmaker's microphone apparently acknowledging his crimes and admitting that he was "caught."

entry.title: Durst heir faces murder charge after documentary broadcast
entry.summary:
Robert Durst is escorted from Orleans Parish Criminal District Court, Monday, March 16, 2015, in New Orleans.

Robert A. Durst's attorney Dick DeGuerin leaves Orleans Parish Criminal District Court in New Orleans, La.

Monday, March 16, 2015, after a hearing for Durst's extradition to Los Angeles to face a 15-year-old murder charge.

Robert A. Durst's attorneys, including Dick DeGuerin, center, and William P. Gibbens, left, speak briefly after leaving Orleans Parish Criminal District Court in New Orleans, La.

entry.title: Robert Durst Charged With First-Degree Murder
Millionaire Robert Durst faces murder charge after broadcast
entry.summary:
Robert Durst couldn't explain away similarities between his handwriting and a letter he said "only the killer could have written" that alerted police to his friend's shooting 15 years ago.

The makers of "The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst" said Durst rejected his lawyer's advice to stay quiet before granting two lengthy interviews.

entry.title: Straight from TV to jail: Robert Durst charged in killing
entry.summary: Since his first wife vanished more than three decades ago, Robert A. Durst, the eccentric and estranged son of one of New York's most prominent real estate dynasties, has lived under the suspicious gaze of law enforcement officials in three states.

entry.title: Straight from TV to jail: Robert Durst charged in killing
entry.summary: "We are relieved and also grateful to everyone who assisted in the arrest of Robert Durst," Douglas Durst said in a statement on Sunday.

entry.title: Wealthy eccentric Robert Durst says in HBO finale he 'killed them all'
entry.summary: The arrest of Robert Durst, a wealthy eccentric linked to two killings and his wife's disappearance, came just before the finale in an HBO show about his life in which he said he "killed them all."

entry.title: Timeline of events in life of wealthy eccentric Robert Durst
entry.summary: HBO airs the first episode of a six-week documentary, "''The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst."

entry.title: Timeline of events in life of wealthy eccentric Robert Durst
Robert Durst Reportedly Arrested Because Of Evidence In 'The Jinx'
entry.summary:
"Years in the making, their thorough research and dogged reporting reignited interest in Robert Durst's story with the public and law enforcement."

entry.title: New York real estate baron Durst arrested on LA murder warrant
entry.summary:
(Reuters) - Robert Durst, scion of one of New York's largest real estate empires, has been arrested in New Orleans on a murder warrant issued by Los Angeles County, the Orleans Parish Sheriff's Office said.

In December 2014, Durst appeared in a New York courtroom on charges of trespassing on property owned by his estranged family.

Robert Durst, who has lived in Texas after getting about $65 million from the settlement of a lawsuit he brought against family trusts, was charged in 2014 with urinating on a drugstore candy rack in Houston.

entry.title: New York property heir Robert Durst arrested on murder warrant
entry.summary: Robert Durst outside court in December 2014, when he was on trial for trespassing on property owned by his estranged family.

entry.title: Real estate heir Robert Durst arrested in New Orleans
